displayIds.description: An array of strings, to be used in matching page ids, to select which results are plotted.  i.e. ['training'] or ['section1_left', 'section1_right']

showSLMNoise.description: Display the background noise measured from the SLM probe in the Audiometry Results Table.

showSvantek.description: Display the background noise measured from the dosimeter in the Audiometry Results Table.
